item.title: Brainwaves Cyber Security Hackathon
item.description: This is the fifth edition of Brainwaves hackathon. The challenges are based on filesystems i.e. how data is stored in the hard disk. We are provided with 2 dumps of a hard disk.

item.title: $PATH to GSoC'17
item.description: It started almost a year back when I heard about GSoC for the first time in an introductory lecture by SDSLabs. I was quite a noob except knowing a little about competitive coding. Then came the day when Google announced the mentoring organisations and I remember going through every single organistion but I couldn’t understand WHAT and WHERE to do. I tried sorting organisations according to programming language but nope, nothing :( I don’t even know about a commit.
